name: Dan Shredder in Hellzone
description:
Dan Shredder in Hellzone is a rhythm rail shooter that is played with a combination of a Guitar and Dance pad controllers (Don't worry if you don't have both of these, you can play it on keyboard as well). Strike a pose and shred to fight your way through the legions of Hell! Will you be able to defeat the Devil in a rock and roll showdown?

Dan Shredder In Hellzone was developed by Legitimate Studios, a team of senior year students attending Champlain College in Burlington, Vermont.


Jacob Staub - Lead Producer
Spencer Owen - Producer

Kyle Strader - Lead Programmer
Dan McLean - Programmer
Cody Carlson - Programmer
Brandon Reynolds - Programmer

Matt Nemiah - Lead Designer
Alex Woloszynski - Designer
Tim Raftery - Designer/Composer

Justin Spognardi: Environmental Artist
Mary Burbridge: Character Artist

Keyboard controls:

1 - 5: the fret board colors

Numpad / arrow keys: targetting enemies
